description:
Hi,

Welcome to our journey---the arts and history of tea.

In this journey,we will talk about the tea history first,enriching the history of tea.

Then we will discuss how to distinguish different kinds of tea and how to steep different kinds of tea by using unique ways.

What's more,we will appreciate the arts and beauty of tea together. And learn several tea movements about tea.

Last but not least,we will learn the tea trade business in China and how people promote it into next level.

Not matter you are a truly tea lover or you just want to get some basic information about tea. This course is designed for you.

Let's start this journey and explore the tea world now.

Thank you!

Naveya tea LLC
title: The arts and history of tea
